TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Specifies drill-down and node viewing mode for an , such as Flowcharts, that are used to compose activities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Drilling down into the UI elements is allowed by default. It can be disallowed by setting the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AllowDrillIn%2A> property to `false`. Child nodes are not always collapsed by default, but can be set to always collapse by setting the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AlwaysCollapseChildren%2A> property to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default values assigned by this constructor are `true` for the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AllowDrillIn%2A> property and `false` for the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AlwaysCollapseChildren%2A> property.
